Detailed Description

This behavior shadows a acquires a given target's course and adjusts its own to match that.

It differs from the original behavior (BHV_Shadow by M. R. Benjamin) by only applying the target's course and not the speed.

It uses three pieces in a range of 180 deg to cover the possible course decision space. See BHV_ShadowCourse.cpp for more info.

bool BHV_ShadowCourse::setParam (  string  param,

Reads parameters from .bhv file.

Is called repeatedly until all parameters are read within the block.

Parameters:
param the current parameter parsed the .bhv file.
val the string value of that parameter.
Returns:
true if the parameter was found and successfully set, false otherwise.
